title: Report: Institutional investors plan to almost double allocations to renewables by 2025

The 15-year deal will see City of London Corporation help fund a 49MW solar farm in Dorset to help power the UK capital's financial district

title: 'Extreme folly': IMO approves controversial shipping emissions regulation
